portfolio-project.project-description: Hi there. Take a look at my portfolio. You will find my lastest projects at the moment. Allons-y!

movie-app-flask-project.project-description: This is a movie App that takes API data. I'm using the framework flask for the backend coding. For displaying I used Bootstrap. The app also includes a custom pagination functionality.

unconscious-game-project.project-description: Divagating & asking questions is the way to discover clues in the game. To discover the unconscious places of your mind.

ranking_app-project.project-description: Ranking system that communicates with the main services of Fulbito5Manager providing a personal ranking profile for each individual player.

course-js.course-subtitle: sponsored by the Government of Buenos Aires
course-js.course-description: Understanding the basic concepts to manage a simple static website page. Learning some CSS concepts and data storage with javascript.

course-py.course-subtitle: sponsored by the Government of Buenos Aires
course-py.course-description: The goal was to create and manage data as well as give it functionality to programs and facilitate the use of complex tasks.

certificates.certificates-4: Introduction to Social Media. Objectives and Metrics.
